text:
Hello Everyone,
I have created meetings and contact notes via API but I am not able to view it unless associating with a contact, Is there a way possible to see it in the app without associating it with a contact.

Hi folks, I was sent here from HubSpot support and hoping someone may be able to help me solve an issue with email links page view tracking.

I cannot get the page view tracking to work through email links to cross domain sites. Even when tracking works in a other contexts e.g. submitting a form we have hooked up through the api and associating the user with _hsq.push(['identify', {email}]).

I have whittled my test page on my external site down to a simple single html file with the HubSpot script embedded and I have verified
• External domain is part of "Additional Site Domains" in the tracking settings
• The HubSpot tracking script and all subsequent scripts load correctly and are visible in the <head>
• Cookie banner shows and cookies are accepted
• The HubSpotutk and other HubSpot tracking cookies are  set
• The tracking parameters exist in the redirect url from the email i.e. _hsenc, _hsmi, utm_medium, utm_content, utm_source
• A request to <https://track.HubSpot.com/__ptq.gif>.... appears in the network traffic and is successful
• No settings or extensions are blocking tracking
Given all this, I get no page view entries in the contact associated with the email links. What might be wrong here?

:orange_heart:*Please take a moment to review our Code of Conduct*:orange_heart:

We want the HubSpot Developer community to be inclusive and welcoming. By following our Code of Conduct, you can help ensure that's the case.

TL;DR:
• Be respectful
• Be inclusive (try not to say, "Hey guys, hey boys, hey [any specific group]")
• No self promotion, except for <#C0121KGC6RM|showcase> and <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> 
• No unsolicited DMs
Read the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/slack/code-of-conduct|whole thing here> - and thanks for being a part of the HubSpot Developer Community!

Want to report a violation? DM <@UQNEXHW14> or fill out the <https://form.asana.com/?k=p7aM0fpd3G4JGETDL_nYXg&d=8587152060687|anonymous form here>.

Hi,
I want to know if I can track the videos in my websites. I was reviewing the documentation but the text is reference to landings. Someone have an idea how track these? Maybe with a class in the default video component?

Hello, our team has gotten a free developer account to build an integration natively between our software and HubSpot. We want to use the HubSpot logo to identify this integration in our UI - does anyone know if this is allowed/what guidelines might cover it (we're not trying to list on the App Marketplace, so not sure hif the App Partner Program <https://www.HubSpot.com/partners/app/branding-guidelines?_gl=1*1dlhwvy*_gcl_au*MTk3MzI0MDA1OS4xNzI1OTAwMTYy*_ga*OTMyODc4NDU3LjE3MjU5NDAyMDQ.*_ga_LXTM6CQ0XK*MTcyNjg1NTM4Ny4zLjAuMTcyNjg1NTM4Ny42MC4wLjA.#integration|guidelines> apply)
